short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip4Me skips YouTube ads automatically for you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin automatically skips YouTube ads that popup frustratingly when listening to music or watching videos. However, the "must watch" ads are not skipped. You can as well toggle it on and off at your convenience.
